short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Built by PolyFlow to access a user's KYC information using zero knowledge proofs without disclosing any user privacy data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
zkVC Chrome Extension is a tool built by PolyFlow to access a user's KYC information using zero knowledge proofs without disclosing any user privacy data.

How zkVC Works:
Start: Log into PolyFlow and connect your wallet.
Launch: Choose Identity Verification, then Add new issuer. PolyFlow will open a new tab and visit your selected KYC provider's website with zkVC Chrome Extension.
Verification: Log into your selected KYC provider's website, then zkVC will verify your ownership and report it to PolyFlow via privacy-preserving zero-knowledge proofs.

Key Features:
Data source URL retrieval: zkVC obtains KYC status from trusted KYC sites and seamlessly opens a dedicated tab for the provider's website of your choice.
Secure Communication: Utilizing a public key encrypted message for secure communication with PolyFlow.
Zero-Knowledge Proof Generation: Generates zero-knowledge proofs only based on the status from the KYC provider's website your selected, ensuring absolute privacy.

Click "Add to Chrome" to install the zkVC Chrome Extension!
